caption: Men in local clothes dance in nature and one of them plays an instrument.
A boy and a little girl are standing next to a bush of pink flowers.
Many men and women are present at a celebration.
A man dancing next to a huge fire.
A man in a hat and a red dress is singing.
A man runs towards a huge fire.
A number of men in white clothes are playing instruments.
A group of men in black clothes are chained in the street.
A mourning ceremony in which men are chained.
Many men, women and children flew colorful kites.
Some young men are playing drums in the street.
A man with his daughter in his arms is walking in the crowd and like the man next to him, he is holding a flower in his hand.
A man and a woman in local dress play drums in the ceremony.
Some women are dancing in local clothes.
A young man carrying something on his shoulder during a mourning ceremony.
A family gathered around a chair with fruits and nuts on it.
